name: Irregularities no defense Proceedings
text:
Irregularities no defense.  It is not a defense to a prosecution under this part: 



	(1)	That the defendant was not competent, for reasons other than lack of penal responsibility, to make the false statement alleged; or 
	(2)	That the statement was inadmissible under the law of evidence; or 
	(3)	That the oath was administered or taken in an irregular manner; or 
	(4)	That the person administering the oath lacked authority to do so, if the taking of the oath was required or authorized by law. [L 1972, c 9, pt of §1]
